org.jooq
Interface ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q extends ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q,R>,R extends Record>

All Superinterfaces:
ConditionProvider, Query, QueryPartProvider, QueryProvider<Q>, ResultProviderQuery<R>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
SelectQuery, SimpleSelectQuery<R>
public interface ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q extends ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q,R>,R extends Record>
extends ResultProviderQuery<R>, ConditionProvider, QueryProvider<Q>

A common interface for SelectQuery and SimpleSelectQuery

Author:
Lukas Eder

Q combine(Q other)
Combine this SelectQuery with another one, using the CombineOperator.UNION operator.

Parameters:
others - The SelectQuery to combine this one with
Returns:
See Also:

asTable

Table<R> asTable()
Use this query as a table

This method is useful for things like SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM x WHERE x.a = '1') WHERE

Returns:
This result provider as a Table object

asField

<T> Field<T> asField()
Use this query as a field.

This method is useful for things like SELECT y.*, (SELECT a FROM x) a FROM y

Returns:
This result provider as a Field<?> object

addLimit

void addLimit(int numberOfRows)
Limit the results of this select

This is the same as calling addLimit(int, int) with lowerBound = 1

Parameters:
numberOfRows - The number of rows to return

addLimit

              int numberOfRows)
Limit the results of this select

Parameters:
lowerBound - The lowest rownum starting at 1
numberOfRows - The number of rows to return
